participant_id.Description: A unique identifier for each participant.

species.Description: The binomial taxonomy name from the NCBI Taxonomy.

age.Description: The age of the participant at time of the first scan session.

sex.Description: The sex of the participant at birth based on self-report.

handedness.Description: The handedness of the participant based on self-report. (Participants responded to the question: With which hand do you eat, brush teeth, write, etc.?)
